recommendations: Mohammad Hossain
Founder & CEO at Institute of Information Technology
July 22, 2017, Charnkiat was a client of Mohammad’s

Mohammad is very resourceful, dedicated and hard working person. The "impossible" and "too hard" doesn’t exist in his dictionary, and it doesn't have meaning in his vocabulary. He is dependable on both professional and personal level"Never doubt yourself for a second, when you put your soul and mind into it,"Nothing is impossible"I met founder of institute of information technology and he is full with energy which inspired all his students to do their best. He is source of inspiration allow the school, faculties and students to move forward toward their goal. In the past, I thought many things are impossible, but he taught and encourage me to do what initially thought was impossible and allow me to give 120%.  founder of institute of information technology worked closely with everyone around , and always give positive energy to those people he interacted with.At first, I joined the institute of information Technology in the hope of getting a good, high-paying job. However, I could never imagine what this school would do for me in the course of a couple of months. I had a highly professional instructor who also works at Google. This is one of the best choices I ever made in my life. I thought this was impossible to make a huge leap in life, but I once again proven myself wrong. Now, my whole mentality had changed with following motto in mind: "Everything is possible as long as you getting try and risk without hesitation". And it led me to a $70 an hour job. I am extremely grateful to the staff of this wonderful school. From this school, I have learnt a lot of mandatory skill sets to perform my job efficiently and it also help building my leadership skills. The courses at this institute is a life-time investment without doubt because it not only allow you to grow from the beginning, it constantly make you grow and make you a different person, and you will see the improvement in your living condition. Even though, I finished my course some time ago, instructor and faculties there are still supportive whenever you are in need of any aid. It is splendid that I could make such a big jump in my career from low pay job to this point.
